1. Vendor Agreement Overview

This agreement governs your use of the GoSnel platform as a restaurant vendor partner. By registering, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms.

2. Account Registration & Management

  • You must provide accurate and complete business information
  • You are responsible for maintaining account security and confidentiality
  • You agree not to operate multiple accounts without GoSnel approval
  • You must maintain valid health permits and business licenses

3. Commission & Payment Terms

  • Commission: GoSnel retains a percentage of each order as commission
  • Settlements: Weekly payouts to your registered bank account
  • Fees: Additional fees may apply for payment methods, refunds, or chargebacks
  • Disputes: You may dispute charges within 30 days of settlement

4. Order Management Responsibilities

As a vendor partner, you agree to:

  • Respond to orders within the specified timeframe (typically 2 minutes)
  • Prepare food according to customer specifications and portion sizes
  • Maintain food safety standards and hygiene practices
  • Clearly label any items with special requirements (allergens, etc.)
  • Communicate any delays or issues immediately through the platform

5. Quality Standards & Ratings

GoSnel monitors vendor performance through:

  • Customer ratings and reviews (displayed publicly)
  • Order acceptance and preparation times
  • Complaint and refund rates
  • Health and compliance audits

Vendors with consistently low ratings or high complaint rates may face suspension or termination.

6. Termination of Partnership

Either party may terminate this agreement with 30 days written notice. GoSnel may terminate immediately if you:

  • Violate health and safety regulations
  • Engage in fraudulent activity
  • Repeatedly breach order quality standards
  • Allow your licenses to expire

7. Liability & Disclaimers

You acknowledge that:

  • You are solely responsible for food quality, safety, and preparation
  • GoSnel is not liable for customer allergic reactions or food poisoning
  • GoSnel does not guarantee delivery times or order fulfillment
  • Our maximum liability is limited to commission fees paid in the last 30 days

8. Intellectual Property

All GoSnel branding, logos, technology, and platform content are proprietary. You agree to use the platform solely for your restaurant business and not to reproduce or distribute our intellectual property without permission.

9. Dispute Resolution & Governing Law

These terms are governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates. Disputes will be resolved through:

  1. Direct communication with GoSnel support team
  2. Mediation (if necessary)
  3. Arbitration through DIAC (Dubai International Arbitration Centre)
